summary: Adds Loki as a follower outside Riverwood with a spare set of Robes and Staff.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a unique follower to Skyrim, based on the Marvel character, Loki , The Asguardian, The Trickster, The God Of Mischief!

This is for Male Only.

You'll find him outside Riverwood. He will level with the player and is a necromancy, he also uses ice spells and has his own perks.

Furthermore, it adds an second set of robes and staff.

***************************************************
The Armour:
Based around the Telvanni robes retextured with the green, gold and black scheme of Loki. It's unenchanted, and can only be crafted under the leather section of the Sky Forge, and tempered as usual at the workbench. Stat-wise it's a little stronger than Telvanni Robes.
Note the set is standalone, and not a replacer of the Telvanni Robes. Although it's based Loki's Robes of Marvel, i've attempted to make it look more armor based, more in keeping with Skyrim. It's about as lore-friendly as you can get.

The Weapon - Staff:
Based on Miraak's Staff retextured with the Silver, gold and aqua scheme of Loki's Staff from Avengers Assemble. It's enchanted with Ice Wall, and can only be crafted under the iron section of the Sky Forge, and tempered as usual at the sharpening wheel. Stat-wise it's a little stronger than Miraaks's Staff.
Note is is standalone, and not a replacer of Miraak's staff. Although it's based Loki's Staff of Marvel, i've attempted to make it look more like a weapon from Skyrim. It's about as lore-friendly as you can get.


**************************************************
Compatibility & Troubleshooting
This mod reqiures Dragonborn DLC.

The armour should not conflict with anything else.
**************************************************

Installation:
Simply extract the archive into the Skyrim folder, so the .esp, textures folder, and meshes folder all land into your skyrim/data directory.
Typically:
C:/Program Files/Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim

C:/Program Files (x86)/Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim
